description:
These are the format conversion scripts formerly included with Taskwarrior releases, but now moved online.
  • export-csv.pl
  • export-html.pl
  • export-ical.pl
  • export-sql.py
  • export-tsv.pl
  • export-xml.pl
  • export-xml.py
  • export-xml.rb
  • export-yad.pl
  • export-yaml.pl
  • import-todo.sh.pl
  • import-yaml.pl
name: Import/Export Format Converters
